author: By BENJAMIN SPILLMAN Reno Gazette Journal
title: Supply of donated meat for Nevada animal sanctuary dries up
description: RENO, Nev. (AP) — Twice per week Lynda Sugasa makes one of the most substantial grocery runs in Nevada.
content:
RENO, Nev. (AP) Twice per week Lynda Sugasa makes one of the most substantial grocery runs in Nevada.
She drives to Winnemucca to pick up hundreds of pounds of donated meat for tigers, lions, cougars and other cats that live at the Imlay-based Safe Haven Wil… [+5525 chars]
